line: Emperor: Welcome.
You must be my newest personal legionary.
I believe your name was Silvius.
I trust that you know who I am?
Of course you do!
I am your Emperor.
Every good roman soldier knows me.
Go talk to my adviser Claudius.
He will give you a task.
I expect it to be completed quickly!
Emperor: I gave you a task.
Stop delaying and get it done!
Adviser Claudius: Greetings.
The Emperor requires you to travel
to the land of Egypt.
There has been a disturbance there.
I am sure its nothing...
Some peasants are claiming that Anubis
has gained access to our world.
Apparently Egypt is already under his control.
Some even say he has prophesied the death
of our beloved Emperor.
Travel to Egypt to prove it wrong.
The journey will be long and dangerous.
There are barbarians occupying the way there.
You need to deal with them too.
You should leave immediately.
Get going already!!
Scout: You must be the one the Emperor sent.
Turn back now if you value your life.
Anubis has taken over all of Egypt!!!
The rumours were all true.
Scout: I warned you...
Roman Soldier: I found you.
We need to get out of here.
The demons of Anubis have taken over Egypt.
We have to tell the Emperor.
Roman Soldier: Let's get going!
Emperor: ....
So it's all true...
Oh no.....
No no no no no no no....
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!
Emperor: ......
Adviser: The Emperor is uhhhh....
distressed by the latest news.
But he certainly does not fear Anubis!!
Even so... I am told of an artifact.
Hidden away in Germania. It can help defeat Anubis.
Fetch it for us.
Adviser: Get going we are running out of time.
Hermit: Who are you?
I see.
Well I have the artifact you search for.
I will give it to you. To defeat Anubis.
I hope you succeed.
Hermit: Good luck on your adventure.
Emperor: You found the artifact to save me?
Hahaha yes!
I was never afraid of Anubis.
Now go destroy him. Hahaha.
Emperor: This is a great day.
Adviser: The Emperor is pleased.
You have done good work so far.
You retrieved the gem of Jupiter.
Jupiter is our god of war.
But you already knew that, of course.
Now we stand a chance against Anubis.
Some of the demons of Anubis have reached Italy.
Stop them before they desecrate Rome itself.
Adviser: I wish you luck. We are counting on you.
